DOC.brief_summary: A multicenter study to evaluate the analgesic efficacy of XP21L in subjects with pain following bunionectomy surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Multicenter Study to Evaluate the Analgesic Efficacy of XP21L in Subjects With Pain Following Bunionectomy Surgery
DOC.criteria: 1865 years of age Have undergone bunionectomy surgery Have achieved adequate postsurgical pain Confounding medical conditions which preclude study participation Participated in a study of another investigational drug or device within 30 days prior to randomization
